markdownRemark.html: Santa Maria Golf is situated in Marbella. The first nine holes are shorter and more complicated than the back nine which are flatter and have wider fairways. Greens are generally spacious. For those in needed of extra tuition the Diego Morito Golf School has one of the best reputations on the coast. Santa María has a magnificent clubhouse, tennis courts, swimming pool and its own lawn bowls rink and club.

frontmatter.title: Santa Maria Golf & Country Club
frontmatter.description: Santa Maria Golf & Country Club -  Santa Maria Golf is situated in Marbella. The first nine holes are shorter and more complicated than the back nine which are flatter and have wider fairways. Greens are generally spacious. For those in needed of extra tuition the Diego Morito Golf School has one of the best reputations on the coast. Santa María has a magnificent clubhouse, tennis courts, swimming pool and its own lawn bowls rink and club.
frontmatter.address: Urb. Elviria, Ctra. Cádiz-Málaga km 192, 29603 Marbella, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 110.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 110.00 euros
